plot: The leftover disbanded partisan battalion draws chetniks' attention, who pushes their plans of attacking the partisan headquarters aside and begins hunting them.
title: Hajka
plot_es: The leftover disbanded partisan battalion draws chetniks' attention, who pushes their plans of attacking the partisan headquarters aside and begins hunting them.
plot_en: The leftover disbanded partisan battalion draws chetniks' attention, who pushes their plans of attacking the partisan headquarters aside and begins hunting them.
